capability.name: Leasing Item Administration
capability.definition: Track the status of the assets underlying leasing agreements as they represent collateral items that could be accessed in the event of account recovery
capability.role: This service domain handles the oversight, administration and confirmation that any required maintenance tasks that are associated with a leased item that is the subject of a leasing agreement financed through the bank. This can include scheduled and ad-hoc item valuations, status/documentation and title checks and tracking upkeep actions that the item owner is obliged to undertake (such as obtaining certification and insurance)
capability.example: The bank reviews the maintenance schedule for a major piece of equipment leased by a customer with bank financing to confirm that preventative maintenance has been undertaken as required and that the equipment is being used as intended

key_features.name: Record and classify leased items
key_features.description: Enables record and classify leased items to support track the status of the assets underlying leasing agreements as they represent collateral items that could be accessed in the event of account recovery
